price: 6 Que de prophètes avons-Nous envoyés aux premières nations !
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
